themes: importance of funding for the arts
lack of affordable and available space for artists
need for programmatic focus on creative arts' added value
key_phrases: not providing space, programs, and funding for the arts is leaving money on the table
Funding is primary for obvious reasons
Space to work is expensive and hard to come by
the city has empty and underused spaces
programing with a focus on the added value of the creative arts
Art can and should be a value add to an organization, city, or culture
Facilitating the organizations that add value far and above their level of funding is the best way to support the community
barriers_identified: expensive and hard to find work space
city has empty and underused spaces
solutions_proposed: make city-owned empty and underused spaces available for artists
develop programming focused on the added value of creative arts
facilitate organizations that provide high value relative to their funding
